title: Breville -- Breville's Adèle Schober Presents — Juicing Recipe: Cotton Candy
description:
For more about Breville products visit: www.brevilleusa.com

Enjoy your Breville juicer with the delicious Cotton Candy, a juicing recipe with blueberries, grapefruit, and guava.
